meanings.definition: The art or practice of making items from leather.
meanings.sent1: She learned leatherwork from her grandfather.
meanings.sent2: The leatherwork on that bag is exquisite.
meanings.sent3: The leatherwork class was a hit with the students.
meanings.sent4: His leatherwork was as smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The smell of leatherwork filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The store displayed a variety of leatherwork.
meanings.sent2: I love the feel of quality leatherwork.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was accented with unique leatherwork.
meanings.sent5: The craftsmanship of the leatherwork was unmatched.
